
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(spdk-lib-nvme)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-nvme PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-nvme PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-nvme PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-ibdrv
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-rdma
  spdk-lib-sock
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-nvme PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ctrlr.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ctrlr_cmd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ctrlr_ocssd_cmd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_fabric.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_io_msg.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ns.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ns_cmd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_ns_ocssd_cmd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_pcie_common.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_poll_group.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_qpair.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_quirks.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_transport.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_zns.c
)

add_global_library_for(spdk-lib-nvme.global spdk-lib-nvme)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-nvme.global PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-nvme.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-nvme.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-ibdrv
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-rdma
  spdk-lib-sock
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-nvme.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_opal.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_pcie.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_rdma.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvme/nvme_tcp.c
)
